tool.name: SAGA.garden_learn_to_program.8
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayELEVATION False output_data_AREA $output_data_AREA name SAGA.garden_learn_to_program.8 ELEVATION $ELEVATION prefer $prefer response $response outputType_AREA $OutputSection_AREA.outputType_AREA transmissionMode_AREA $OutputSection_AREA.transmissionMode_AREA

param.name: ELEVATION
param.label: Elevation grid
param.help: This must be your input data of type grid. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, x-ogc-envi, png, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_AREA
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

param.name: outputType_AREA
param.label: Catchment area
param.help: This will contain your output data of type grid.

tool.help: Extended Neighbourhoods - Use recursive function calls for catchment area calculations.<br/>(c) 2003 by Olaf Conrad, Goettingen<br/>email: oconrad@gwdg.de
